name: El Shaddoll Apkallone
desc:
2 "Shaddoll" monsters with different Attributes
Must first be Fusion Summoned. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Shaddoll" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "El Shaddoll Apkallone" once per turn.
